sentence.Network_en: It mainly involved standardizing the behaviors ofofficials and government administration, and advocating incorruption, especially in province.
sentence.Network_cn: 主要涉及规范官员和政府行政行为和反对腐败尤其是行省腐败等方面.

sentence.Network_en: For this corruptible must put on incorruption, and this mortal must put on immortality.
sentence.Network_cn: 53这必朽坏的,总要变成不朽坏的.(变成原文作穿下同)这必死的,总要变成不死的.

sentence.Network_cn: 林前十五53因这必朽坏的,必要穿上不朽坏;这必死的,必要穿上不死.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 接近Incrassative的字词 ...incorruption 不腐败,清廉洁白incorruptness 清廉,廉正
...冒的。“愿所有诚心爱我们主耶稣基督的人都蒙恩惠！”（《以弗所书》，6：24）希腊文的最后一个词意指“不腐”（incorruption），它表明，使徒保罗意识到，有许多人对耶稣的爱不纯净，或者不是属灵的。

list.abs: High source of integrity , impartialand incorruptible ., 高源刚正不阿 , 铁面无私.

Texaco , an oil giant now subsumed by Chevron , had such an incorruptible reputation that African border guards were said to wave its jeeps through without engaging in the ritual shakedown .现已并入雪佛龙的石油巨头德士古，曾有廉洁的名声，据说以至于非洲的边境警卫让他们的吉普车顺畅通行而不是通常的勘路拦截。
theory and practice on incorruptible culture construction in universities ., 高校廉政文化建设的理论与实践.
enterprise incorruptible management is the objective requirements for precautions against commercial bribery .企业廉洁经营是预防商业贿赂的客观要求。
